nodes.text: Pho Ph'eah was an astronomical object located within the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, in the grid square P-5 of the Standard Galactic Grid. It was connected to the planets of Telos and Toprawa by the Hydian Way hyperspace route.

Pho Ph'eah was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game boxed set. The planet originated within the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1979 novel Han Solo's Revenge, written by Brian Daley.
